content: At this point in the game, I only know Paul Ryan as the disingenuous republican troll who is only focused on providing more tax cuts for America’s upper class and has absolutely zero regret, remorse, or guilt about syphoning away millions of dollars away from tens of millions of America’s most needy along the way. If Karma saw fit to drop a large metal meteorite on his head, I would argue that day should be made into an American holiday.
